meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order, Pledge of Allegiance, and Roll Call
Public Comments on Items III – VI
Vote to Approve the June 13th, 2024 Meeting Minutes
Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment Subcommittee Update
agenda_items.description: The subcommittee will update the commission on their past meeting, discuss the recommended final edits to the Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment, and vote to accept the recommendations.

agenda_items.title: VAC Website Update
agenda_items.description: The commission will discuss and vote on updating the website by adding brief bios and pictures for each of the commissioners.

agenda_items.title: Dr. Katina Robertson Proclamation
agenda_items.description: The commission will discuss a proclamation to honor the late commissioner for District 3 Dr. Katina Robertson. The proposed date to present the proclamation is Wednesday, November 6 during the City Council Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: University Hills Veteran Breakfast took place from 10:00 to 11:30 a.m. on Saturday August 3 at Operation Tiny House located at 7303 University Hills Blvd, Dallas 75241. This occurs monthly, on the first Saturday.
